column1: Uchi////I think the Machi Cure is probably the most popular item
column2: as this dish also exists at the location in Austin
column3: and the chefs were recommending this to everybody. I also ordered the Uchiviche
column4: in which you can really taste how fresh the fish they serve is
column5: and also the Ham & Eggs - pork katsu with creamed egg in a sushi roll. PHENOMENAL.
